name: Gun Shooting: Shooting Range S
description:
Gun Shooting: Shooting Range Sim!
You’ll be able to check a wide range of perfect shooting weapons aiming at this special target – a watermelon! Do you think that’s easy? Let’s check it together right on your smartphone!
Feature:
30 intense watermelon shooting levels
Multiple weapons shooting on fresh fruits
Real physics base puzzle and shooting maze
Realistic fruit crushing and smashing animations
Smooth sniper scope to give you best sniper games experience
